attributes.action: MAKE MOTORCYCLE AWARNESS PART OF THE DRIVING TEST
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
TO MANY MOTORCYCLISTS ARE GETTING INJURRED OR KILLED DUE TO PEOPLE JUST NOT LOOKING AND THINKING AT JUNCTIONS.
NEW DRIVERS SHOULD BE TOUGHT TO BE MORE AWARE OF THE DANGERS IN NOT LOOKING FOR MOTORCYCLISTS TO TRY AND REDUCE ACCIDENTS.
